mapper.select: select t1.FID, t1.FNUMBER, t2.FNAME from T_BD_FLEXITEMGROUP t1, T_BD_FLEXITEMGROUP_L t2 where t1.FID = t2.FID and t1.FID in ( select DISTINCT FITEMDETAILID from T_BD_ACCOUNT ) order by t1.FID
select t1.FID, t1.FNUMBER, t2.FNAME, t1.FFLEXNUMBER from T_BD_FLEXITEMPROPERTY t1, T_BD_FLEXITEMPROPERTY_L t2 where t1.FID = t2.FID order by t2.FID
